subject: Free Workout DVD with Prevention Magazine
body:
Today you can save 45% off. Add that to your FREE Walking DVD, and you’ll save over
                    $30! How's that for a bargain!

                    To take advantage of this exclusive offer, simply click
                    here.

By subscribing today not only will you save more, you’ll
                      also get more. Prevention has a fresh, beautiful new look
                      you’ll love, and we’ve
                    worked hard to make each and every page more relevant to
                      your life, and your health.


Find
                          more Smart Ways to Live Well in every issue, including
                          these new additions:



More expert
                            advice from our Health Advisory Board, including
                            Pamela Peeke, and Dr. Arthur Agatston.



Expanded
                            in-depth coverage of the health issues that matter
                            in your life, from nutrition tips you can start today,
                            to fitness programs designed to help you start feeling
                            the difference in just a week.



More fast, taste-tested
                            recipes your whole family will love.



Real-life
                            inspiration: See how other women just like you are
                            succeeding at life's challenges, and how their success
                            can speed yours.



Contributions
                            from names you know and trust, including Dr. Andrew
                            Weil on alternative health, Bobbi Brown on beauty,
                            and many more.


Dont Miss Out...This great
                    offer will expire. 
This great offer won't last forever.
                  To take advantage of your chance to get a FREE copy of the Walk
                  Yourself Fit DVD,
                  you must act now. Just click
                  here! 
To your health,

                  Chris Cunningham
                  Customer Relations
                  Prevention
P.S. This subscription
                  and DVD offer from Prevention won't last forever. Click
                  here to save 45% on Prevention plus get the Walk
                  Yourself Fit DVD now! 




 









Order
                now, and you can enjoy a
              boost in your metabolism & increase calorie burning with Walk
              Yourself Fit: Developed
              byexperts, this all new DVD features a revolutionary, easy-to-follow
              walking routine that makes it easy to slim down & tone up fast:

              The A-B-C program consists of bursts of Accelerated
              speed, Body shaping moves and Cardio
              fat burning. 

Get
                    in shape in just minutes a day
Fire
                            up your metabolism
Burn
                                  more calories-even at rest!
Includes
                                            a high energy music CD

Best of all, Walk
                                            Yourself Fit is yours FREE
                                            (a $14.95 value) when you take advantage
                                            of this very special offer today.
